report.title: Blurred PoMS results
report.description: All PomS results. Includes blurred location data. Note this will only work on BRC Live Warehouse as I had to include hard-coded survey IDs 636, 637, 638, 641
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values hab_sav on hab_sav.sample_id = csf.id AND hab_sav.sample_attribute_id = #habitat_smp_id# AND hab_sav.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms hab_term on hab_term.id = hab_sav.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values target_sav on target_sav.sample_id = csf.id AND target_sav.sample_attribute_id = #target_smp_id# AND target_sav.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms target_term on target_term.id = target_sav.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id = csf.id LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav on oav.occurrence_id = cof.id AND occurrence_attribute_id = #insect_abund_occ_id# AND oav.deleted = false #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND csf.survey_id in ( #public_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_pan_traps_survey_id#,#fit_count_app_survey_id# ) AND ((trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR csf.date_end >= CAST('#year#' || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR csf.date_start <= CAST('#year#' || '-12-31' as date))) AND (CAST(csf.survey_id AS character varying) = '#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='')

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: habitat_smp_id
param.description: ID of sample attribute that holds the habitat.

param.name: target_smp_id
param.description: ID of sample attribute that holds the target flower.

param.name: insect_abund_occ_id
param.description: ID of occurrence attribute that holds abundances of the insects.

param.name: year
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: public_fit_count_survey_id
param.description: ID of the public fit count survey.

param.name: 1km_fit_count_survey_id
param.description: ID of the 1km fit count survey.

param.name: 1km_pan_traps_survey_id
param.description: ID of the 1km pan traps survey.

param.name: fit_count_app_survey_id
param.description: ID of the fit count app survey.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for
param.lookup_values: 636:FIT Count,637:FIT Count 1km,638:1km pan traps,641:FIT Count App

column.name: survey_title
column.sql: case csf.survey_id when #public_fit_count_survey_id# then 'FIT Count' when #1km_fit_count_survey_id# then 'FIT Count 1km' when #1km_pan_traps_survey_id# then '1km pan traps' when #fit_count_app_survey_id# then 'FIT Count App' else '' END

column.name: show_public_fit_count_edit_icon
column.display: Show public fit count edit icon
column.sql: CASE WHEN (CAST(csf.survey_id AS character varying) = '#public_fit_count_survey_id#' OR CAST(csf.survey_id AS character varying) = '#fit_count_app_survey_id#') AND CAST(csf.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#current_user_id#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: show_1km_fit_count_edit_icon
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(csf.survey_id AS character varying) = '#1km_fit_count_survey_id#' AND CAST(csf.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#current_user_id#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: show_1km_pan_traps_edit_icon
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(csf.survey_id AS character varying) = '#1km_pan_traps_survey_id#' AND CAST(csf.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#current_user_id#' THEN true ELSE false END
